text: Hey, thank you for waiting. Sorry about all of that.
The staff around here have been LOADED with work...
Well, anyways, let's get started, shall we? We only have a few things to check up on.
First off, let's discuss how you're feeling. I understand that you've been through a lot this past month.
Just want to make sure that the stress hasn't caused anything to get worse, and that all of your medications are working as intended.
If you have any concerns, let me know. Think you can do that?
